page.title: 14GEOGRAPHY AND ECOLOGY
page.content: The nature of the land depends on the resistance of the rock.Hard Cefn sandstone form highland and soft shale forms lowland.This surface is incised by rivers which erode valleys.Most land is managed but some has reverted to grass,gorse,broom and birch woodland eg. the NSM workings.There is a variety of birds and small mammals.Monsanto,a large chemical works in Cefn,employs a number of people.The brickworks have been replaced by small industrial estates. Houses are mainly made from local materials.Most of the old houses were built around 1900.There are a few modern housing estates.Transport is mainly cars but there are train and bus services.Farming is mainly cattle but there are some sheep.The vegetation is mainly grass for grazing.
